verbose_text: Briefly, FAK and ERK1/2 KD was performed using Silencer (R) siRNA (100 nM) and Neon (R) transfection system (ThermoFisher) with pre-optimized electroporation conditions (1,400 V; 20 mS; 2 pulses) that resulted in significant reduction of FAK and ERK1/2 mRNA expressions in comparison with scrambled siRNA and negative control without siRNA.
